name: Sky Knight: The Musical
description:
Welcome to the Sky Knight Musical! You play as the musical's protagonist, a brave angel fighting off the forces of the underworld.

This is no easy task... because you're afraid of heights. When the play begins you've got to maneuver through the air on your fly cable rope, but make sure that nothing snaps it! Your own fears might make you believe there's a giant hand waiting to clip your wings!
